items.sentence: You don't think that I'd betray my friends, do you?

Tom often flirts with the girls that he works with.
Tom was pronounced dead on arrival at the hospital.
I don't think that anybody else noticed you crying.
Things spun out of control very quickly after that.
Were you able to catch the ball that Tom threw you?
It's a long way from here. You should take the bus.
I don't think that that's what people really think.
With trembling hands, Tom tried to light the match.
Tom spends at least three hours a day on his horse.
Tom hasn't yet paid back the money that he owes me.
Tom isn't the right person to talk with about this.
Tom started a club, and Mary was the first to join.
Living on three hundred dollars a month isn't easy.
Tom isn't at the back door. He's at the front door.
I'm sorry Tom wasn't able to attend the conference.
You won't have to worry about this happening again.
You don't have to do anything if you don't want to.

I don't think Tom will ever come back to Australia.
